japanese:
おおおお～！
なんだか沖縄っぽい門だ！
translation:
Oooohh!
This gate looks very Okinawan!

japanese: この門、テレビで見たことある。
translation: I've seen this torii gate on TV before.

japanese:
守礼門ですね。
沖縄にある建築物でも有名なものですから、
メディアにもよく取り上げられますよ。
translation:
That's Shureimon.
It's a famous building in Okinawa,
so it's often featured in the media.

japanese:
門の上に額があるけど、
あれで守礼って読むのかしら？
translation:
There's a plaque on top of the gate,
is that how 'shurei' is read?

japanese:
あれは、しゅれいのくに、と書かれてる。
礼節を守るという意味だ。
translation:
That's read as 'shurei no kuni,'
meaning to uphold etiquette.

japanese:
へー、そうなの。
さすがフー君。
translation:
Oh, I see.
You really know your stuff, Fu-kun.

japanese:
やっぱり、こういう知ってる風景に出会うと
沖縄に来たぞーって感じがして
テンション上がりますね！
translation:
When you find places you've known about but
never been to like this one, it really makes you feel like
you're in Okinawa and it's very exciting!

japanese:
ねえ、中に入る前にみんなで写真撮らない？
沖縄観光一発目の記念写真。
translation:
Hey, before we go in,
should we all take a photo together?
A commemorative photo of our first Okinawa sightseeing.

japanese: おう、こういう定番どころは押さえとかないとな。
translation: Yeah, we should definitely hit up more of these famous spots much like this one.

japanese: 写真……フータローと……。
translation: A picture...with Futaro...

japanese:
三玖？
写真撮るぞ、こっち来いって。
translation:
Miku?
We're gonna take a picture, c'mere.

japanese: ひゃあっ！？
translation: HYAAH?!

japanese:
うおっ！？
すまん、驚かせたか？
translation:
Woah?!
Sorry, did I startle you?

japanese:
わ、私、らいはちゃんと撮りたい！
二乃！　撮って！
translation:
I-I wanna take a picture with Raiha-chan!
Nino! Take it!

japanese: はいはい。
translation: Okay, okay.

japanese:
えー！　三玖ズルい！
私もらいはちゃんと撮りたーい！
translation:
Whaaa! Miku, you're so sneaky!
I want to take a picture with Raiha-chan, too!

japanese: じゃあ、らいはちゃんを真ん中にして――
translation: Alright, Raiha-chan will be in the center, then.

japanese:
ほら、両手に四葉と三玖。
らいはちゃんはモテモテだなぁ。
translation: Well aren't you just so popular, Raiha-chan.

japanese: えへへー。
translation: Ehehe.

japanese:
撮るわよー。
はい、チーズ。
translation:
I'm gonna take a picture.
Alright, say cheese.

japanese: いえーい！
translation: Cheeeeese!

japanese: い、いえーい。
translation: Ch-cheese.

japanese: ……うーん。
translation: Umm.

japanese: じゃあ次は全員で！
translation: Alright, now let's take a group photo!

japanese: 全員って誰がシャッター押すのよ。
translation: Who's gonna take the picture if everyone's gonna be in the photo?

japanese:
ああ、私がやるよ。
その後に誰か交代して、もう１枚撮ろ。
translation:
Okay, I will.
I'll take one, then someone else can take the next one.

japanese: はい、並んで並んで。
translation: Alright, line up, line up.

japanese:
あれ？
三玖、上杉さんの隣じゃなくていいの？
translation:
Hm?
Miku, you don't need to be next to Uesugi-san?

japanese:
えっ！？
べ、別に、いまはいいかなって！
translation:
HUH?!
I-It's fine!

japanese:
お兄ちゃん、もっと気を利かせないと。
こういう時は隣にエスコートだよ。
translation:
Big bro, you need to be more attentive.
You should be standing next to her at times like these.

japanese: いや、だが……。
translation: Yeah, but...

japanese:
いいよ！　これでいいから！
一花、早く撮って！
translation:
Okay! This is good enough!
Ichika, take it quickly!

japanese:
はーい。
それじゃ行くよー。
translation:
Okay.
Alright then, here we go.

japanese:
じゃあ私が撮るから！
一花、並んで！
translation:
Wait, let me take it!
Ichika, come line up!

japanese: うん、ありがとね。
translation: Kay, thanks.

japanese:
三玖、いいんですか？
私が撮りましょうか？
translation:
Miku, are you alright?
Shall I take the picture?

japanese:
いいよ、大丈夫。
じゃあみんな、撮るよ。
translation: No don't worry about it. Everyone get ready.

japanese: はーい。
translation: Right-o.

japanese:
！……
フータローが、こっち見て……！
translation:
!...
Futaro, look this way!

japanese: 三玖？　どうしたのよ？
translation: Miku? What's wrong?

japanese: ご、ごめん、いま撮るっ！
translation: S-sorry! I'll take it now!

japanese: オッケー撮れた！　じゃあ進もう！
translation: Alright! I took it! Now, let's keep moving!

japanese:
えっ！？
三玖、そんなに急がなくても時間はあるよー！
translation:
Wait, what?
Miku, there's no need to rush.
We have time, you know?

japanese: 三玖さーん！　待ってー！
translation: Miku-saaan! Wait!

japanese: （本当になんなんだよ、三玖……）
translation: (What the heck is going on, what's up with Miku...?)

japanese: フー君、私たちも行きましょ。
translation: Fu-kun, you too, let's go.

japanese: あ、ああ。
translation: Y-yeah.

japanese: 一花、これは……。
translation: Ichika, this is...

japanese: フータロー君に聞いてみるしかないよね、やっぱり。
translation: We have no choice but to ask Futaro-kun, right?

japanese: 三玖、大丈夫？
translation: Miku, are you okay?

japanese: 大丈夫……だと思う……。
translation: I think...I'm okay...

japanese: 体力ないのに走ったりするからよ。
translation: It's cause you tried to run when you don't even have stamina.

japanese:
首里城は意外に高低差があるからな。
無理しないで、のんびり行こうぜ。
translation:
Shurijo Castle has a surprising amount
of elevation changes.
Let's take it easy.

japanese: う、うん……。
translation: O-okay...

japanese:
ここの門、すごいねー。
なんていうか強そう！
translation:
This torii gate is amazing!
It looks so durable!

japanese:
これは瑞泉門（ずいせんもん）っていう門ですよ。
おめでたい泉、という意味なんです。
translation:
This is Zuisenmon.
It means 'auspicious spring.'

japanese:
へー！
四葉さん、物知りだね。
translation:
Wow!
Yotsuba-san, you're so knowledgeable!

japanese: でへへへ～、それほどでも～。
translation: Hehehe, you're making me blush.

japanese:
四葉ー、パンフレットが
ポケットからはみ出してるわよー。
translation: Yotsuba, your brochure is sticking out of your pocket.

japanese:
はうっ！？
バラさないでよ二乃ぉ！
translation:
AAGH?!
Don't expose me like that, Nino!

japanese: ふふっ。
translation: Teehee.

japanese:
（笑ってる。
　いまはいつも通りの三玖だよな。
　だが、さっきは明らかにおかしかった）
translation:
(She's laughing. Miku seems like her usual self now,
 but earlier, she was definitely acting strange.)

japanese: フータロー君、ちょっといい？
translation: Futaro-kun, can I talk to you for a second?

japanese: ん？　なんだよ。
translation: Hm? What is it?

japanese: 三玖のことで、少し。
translation: It's about Miku.

japanese:
おや？
その顔、なにか聞かれたくないことが
あるって感じだね。
translation: Hmm? It looks like you don't want to be asked about something.

japanese: 別にそんなんじゃ……。
translation: It's not like that...

japanese:
フータロー君さ、
もしかして三玖にオイタしちゃった？
translation:
Futaro-kun,
did you do something to upset Miku?

japanese:
はあっ！？
オイタってなんだよ。
translation:
WHA%p-2;――%p;?!
What do you mean, upset her?

japanese:
例えば、困らせるようなことを
したんじゃないかなって。
translation:
Like, you did something to bother her,
or something like that.

japanese:
沖縄に来てから三玖の様子がおかしいのです。
思うに、あなたを避けているような……。
translation:
Since coming to Okinawa, Miku has been acting strange.
I think she's avoiding you...

japanese:
図星かな？
オイタしちゃいました？
translation:
I'm right, aren't I?
Could it be that you unintentionally
made her upset?

japanese: 上杉君！？
translation: Uesugi-kun?!

japanese:
いや違う、濡れ衣だ！
確かに避けられてる気はするが、
理由は思いつかない！
translation:
No, that's not true! That's a false accusation!
I do feel like I'm being avoided,
but I can't think of any reason why!

japanese:
本当ですか？
あなたのことですから、無自覚のうちに
なにかしてしまったのでは？
translation:
Really now?
Knowing you,
could it be that you did something unconsciously?

japanese:
女の子の心は繊細なんだからね？
なんでもない一言で、なんてこともあるんだよ？
translation:
Well, a girl's heart is delicate, you know?
Even the smallest things can hurt a girl's feelings.

japanese: ……とにかく、俺には心当たりがないんだよ。
translation: Anyway, I have no idea what it could be about.

japanese:
わかりました。
一応、ここはあなたの言葉を信用しましょう。
translation: Alright fine. For now, I'll trust your words.

japanese: うわぁ、綺麗……！
translation: Wowww, it's so pretty!

japanese: すごいね、これは……。
translation: This is really amazing....

japanese:
ええ、これほど鮮やかだとは
思いませんでした。
translation: Yes, I didn't expect it to be this beautiful.

japanese: ここって中にも入れるんですよね？
translation: We can go inside, right?

japanese: おう、入れるぞ。
translation: Yeah, we can.

japanese:
正面の建物は正殿で
左右にあるのは南殿と北殿っていうんだが、
中に展示室もあるはずだ。
translation:
The building in front of us is the main hall, and the
buildings on the left and right are the south and
north halls, with an exhibition room inside too.

japanese: へえ、かなり見応えありそう。
translation: Wow, it looks very impressive.

japanese:
なら、ここからは
みんな好きに回ればいいんじゃない？
translation: Then, why don't we all just explore freely for a while?

japanese:
そうだね。
終わったら、ここに集合にしよっか。
translation: Sounds good. Let's meet back here when we're finished.

japanese: （よし、ならここはやっぱり三玖と……）
translation: (Okay, in that case, I'll stick with Miku...)

japanese:
では、私はさっそく中に入ってみます。
らいはちゃんもどうですか？
translation:
Well, I'll go in and take a look.
Raiha-chan, do you want to come too?

japanese: うん、行ってみたい。
translation: Yeah, I wanna go too.

japanese:
私はもう少し散歩してからにしようかな。
この素敵な風景、目に焼き付けておきたいから。
じゃねー。
translation:
I think I'll take a walk for a little longer.
I want to take in this beautiful scenery. See ya.

japanese: あの、フータ――
translation: Um, Futa%p-2;――

japanese:
なあ、三玖。
俺と一緒に――
translation:
Hey, Miku.
You wanna go with me to%p-2;――

japanese: ひゃっ！？
translation: HYAA?!
Ah...

japanese: また逃げられたわね。
translation: She ran away again.

japanese: 二乃、四葉……。
translation: Nino, Yotsuba...

japanese: あの、上杉さんにお聞きしたいことがありまして。
translation:
Excuse me, Uesugi-san,
there's something I wanted to ask you.

japanese:
（そう言って２人が話し出したのは、
　さっき一花と五月が言ってきたことと同じだった）
translation:
(As the two started talking,
 I quickly realized it was the same thing
 that Ichika and Itsuki mentioned earlier.)

japanese: そう、身に覚えはないわけね。
translation: So, you don't have any recollection, do you.

japanese:
ううーん、だとすると
ますます謎が深まっちゃいます。
translation:
Well, if that's the case,
the mystery only thickens.

japanese: とりあえず、俺は三玖を捜しに行ってくる。
translation: For now, I'll just go look for Miku.

japanese:
（こうなると三玖自身に聞くしかない。
　また逃げられるかもしれないが、
　その時は追うまでだ）
translation:
(At this rate I'll have to ask Miku myself.
 She might try to run away again,
 but I'll chase her down if I have to.)

japanese:
（だが、どこに行ったんだ？
　闇雲に探しても見つからないかもしれない）
translation:
(But, where could she have gone?
 If I just start searching blindly,
 I'll never be able to find her.)

japanese: （三玖が行きそうな所……）
translation: (Where's a place Miku would likely go...)

japanese:
（！……
　わかった、多分あそこだな）
translation:
(!...
 Got it, probably that place.)

japanese:
はあ……。
なんで逃げちゃうのかな、私……。
translation:
*sigh*
Why did I run away...

japanese: フータロー、きっと怒ってる。
translation: Futaro is definitely mad.

japanese:
ホントはフータローと一緒に回りたいのに。
沖縄で、２人の思い出を……。
translation:
Truth be told, I actually really wanted to tour around with him.
To make memories, just the two of us,
together in Okinawa...

japanese: 三玖。
translation: Miku.

japanese: ふっ、フータロー！？
translation: F-Futaro?!

japanese:
ここは和風建築なんだな。
まあ、書院って言うくらいだし当然か。
translation:
This place has a Japanese style to it.
Well, it's called the 'shoin,'
so I guess it's only natural.

japanese:
（じりじりと俺から離れてる。
　だが逃げないだけマシだ、
　まずはこのまま会話を続けるんだ！）
translation:
(She's edging away from me, but at least
 she's not running away.
 I'll try to keep the conversation going!)

japanese: やっぱり、お前はここにいたな。
translation: You're here, I knew it.

japanese: 『やっぱり』？　どうして？
translation: 'You knew it?' What do you mean?

japanese: 言葉にするのは難しいんだが……。
translation: I don't know how to explain it...

japanese:
三玖は和風が好きだろ。
だからここ、奥書院（おくしょいん）にいると思った。
translation:
But, I knew you liked Japanese-style architecture, Miku.
So I figured you'd be here in the 'okushoin.'

japanese: ……そっか。
translation: ...Is that so.

japanese: フータローは……私のこと、よくわかってる。
translation: Futaro...you know me well.

japanese:
ま、まあな。
俺はお前の……その、お前と付き合って……。
translation:
I-I guess so.
I mean... I am, dating you, so...

japanese: っ！

わ、私、次行くね！
じゃあ！
translation:
I-I'm gonna go check out other things!
See ya!

japanese: あ、おい三玖！？
translation: Ah, hey, Miku?!

japanese: いやあ、晴れてよかったなぁ。
translation: Man, the weather sure is nice.

japanese:
うん。
よかった、ね。
translation:
Yeah.
It's great.

japanese: まだ、みんな戻ってきてないな。
translation: Everyone's still not back.

japanese:
うん。
きて、ない、ね。
translation:
Yeah.
True.

japanese: あー……。
translation: Ahhh...

japanese: （会話が続かない……！）
translation: (I can't keep the conversation going!)

japanese:
（別に、俺たちのあいだでは
　こういう沈黙は珍しくない。
　２人で出かけても会話がない時間だってある）
translation:
(It's not like this kind of silence is uncommon between us.
 Even when we go out together,
 there are moments, we don't converse at all.)

japanese:
（普段はそれでもいいんだと思えていた。
　それもまた、俺たちのあり方なんだと）
translation:
(Usually, I think it's okay.
 It's just how we are as a couple.)

japanese:
（だがいまは違う！
　こんな気まずい沈黙は初めてだぞ！？）
translation:
(But this time, it's different!
 We've never had this much of an awkward silence before?!)

japanese:
そ、そうだ三玖！
首里城のこんな話を知ってるか！？
translation:
Th-that's right, Miku!
Do you know the story about Shurijo Castle?!

japanese:
最初に通った守礼門、あるだろ。
あれはなんと２千円札の絵柄になってるんだ！
translation:
Remember the first gate, Shureimon we passed through?
It's on the 2,000 yen bill!

japanese:
に、２千円札。
そう、なんだ。
translation:
Th-the 2,000 yen bill.
I, see.

japanese:
あ、あとな！
この広場は御庭（うなー）って言うんだが、
地面が赤と白の縞々になってるだろ。
translation:
A-and!
This plaza is called the 'una,'
and the ground is striped with red and white, right?

japanese:
これは、役人が儀式で整列する時、
位（くらい）の順に並ぶための目印に使ってたんだ！
translation:
It was used as a marker to line up in order of rank for government officials
during ceremonies!

japanese: そう、なんだ。
translation: I, see.

japanese:
（……ダメだ。
　どうにも三玖の反応が薄い気がする）
translation:
(...It's no use.
 No matter what I say, Miku's not really reacting.)

japanese: こういうのは興味ないか。
translation: You're not interested in this stuff, eh?

japanese:
えっ？
そういうわけじゃない、けど。
translation:
Huh?
That's, not really the case.

japanese: そ、そうか。
translation: I-I see.

japanese:
あのさ、三玖――
あのね、フータロー――
translation:
Hey, Miku%p-2;――
%p;Um, Futaro%p-2;――

japanese:
すまん、こんなウンチク話ばかりで。
勉強みたいで面白くないよな。
translation:
Sorry about the boring trivia questions.
It was like studying. I'm sure it wasn't interesting.

japanese: えっ？　そんなこと、ないけど。
translation: Huh? That's not really true.

japanese: その、フータローは面白いよ？
translation: You're interesting, you know, Futaro?

japanese: いや、俺じゃなくてウンチクのことなんだが。
translation: Nah, I didn't mean me, but the trivia questions.

japanese:
あっ！？
そっちも、面白かったよ？
translation:
AH?!
Those were interesting, too.

japanese: そ、そうか。
translation: I-I see.

japanese:
あのさ、三玖――
あのね、フータロー――
translation:
Hey, Miku%p-2;――
%p;Um, Futaro%p-2;――

japanese: なにか質問あるか？
translation: Do you have any questions?

japanese: 質問？
translation: Questions?

japanese:
首里城のことでも沖縄のことでもなんでもいい。
三玖となにか話したいんだ。
translation:
Whether it's about Shurijo Castle, Okinawa,
or anything else, it doesn't matter.
It could be about anything, I'd just like to talk to you Miku.

japanese:
沖縄に来てから、俺たち
ほとんど話せてなかっただろ？
translation:
Since we came to Okinawa,
we haven't really had a chance to talk, have we?

japanese:
う、うん。
そう……だね。
translation:
Y-yeah.
That's...right.

japanese:
私のこと、気にしてくれてたんだ。
やっぱりフータローは優しい。
translation:
You were concerned about me, weren't you?
You're really kind after all, Futaro.

japanese: え？　なんだ？
translation: Huh? What do you mean?

japanese:
ううん。
私も、フータローともっと話したいって思ってた。
translation:
No.
I also wanted to talk to you more, Futaro.

japanese: そ、そうか！
translation: I-is that so!

japanese:
あのさ、三玖――
あのね、フータロー――
translation:
Hey, Miku%p-2;――
%p;Um, Futaro%p-2;――

japanese: ん、なんだ？
translation: Hm, what?

japanese: フータローが先でいいよ。
translation: You go first.

japanese:
そうか？
じゃあ、その、今夜なんだが。
translation: Oh, really? Well, then, I was thinking tonight%p-2;――

japanese: 今夜……！
translation: Tonight!

japanese: ああ、もし三玖がよければ一緒に――
translation: Yeah, if you're okay, we could go together to%p-2;――

japanese: 一緒にっ！？
translation: T-together?!

japanese:
わ、私、もうちょっと見てくる。
じゃあ後で。
translation:
I-I'm gonna go take a look at that.
See you later.

japanese:
（わからん。
　三玖がなにを考えてるのか、さっぱりだ）
translation:
(I don't understand.
 I don't have the slightest clue, what Miku is thinking.)

japanese:
（避けられているのは確かだろう。
　とはいえ嫌われている感じでもない）
translation:
(It's certain that she's avoiding me,
 but it doesn't feel like she dislikes me either.)

japanese:
（これはもうなりふり構っている場合じゃない。
　あいつらに探りを入れてみよう）
translation:
(There's no time to hesitate.
 Let's try to get some information out of the others.)

japanese:
（さっきはあいつらから俺に聞いて来たが、
　むしろ、あいつらのほうが
　なにか知ってるんじゃないか？）
translation:
(They'd asked me what's going on earlier,
 but maybe they actually know something?)

japanese:
（そもそも、三玖の様子がおかしい原因が
　俺でない可能性だってあるわけで――）
translation:
(Besides, there's a possibility
 that I'm not the reason for Miku's strange behavior%p-2;――%p;)

japanese:
（ぐああああっ！　なんだこのモヤモヤは！
　それはそれで気に食わねぇ！！）
translation:
(GAAAAHH! What's this uneasy feeling?!
 I don't like it!!)

japanese: はあ……。
translation: *sigh*

japanese:
（これが……三玖が、あいつらが
　常に全力を出してきた恋愛ってものか）
translation: (So this...is how it feels like to be the pursuer in the relationship?)

japanese: 確かに、全力でなきゃどうにもならないな。
translation:
Indeed, if you don't go all out,
nothing good will come out of it.
